  • Method Details

    • checkCoinSeat

      public boolean checkCoinSeat(StudentEnum table, int seat)
      checks if the player who just put a student in his board should receive a coin If that's the case, remove it from the pile of available coins on this table
      Parameters:
      table - the table whose seat you want to check
      seat - the seat of the table you want to check
      Returns:
      true if the given seat in the given table has a coin on it; false otherwise
